revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:AFX_Drops}}This is one of the [[sound sequence]]s used for ''[[Heretic]]'''s [[ambient sound]]s. Although it is played from {{Class|HereticSoundSequence3}}, it can also be used independently.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Drops environment 2 slot [[HereticAmbience]]
play world/amb3 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb7 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb3 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb7 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb3 delayrand 16 47 play world/amb7 delayrand 16 47 end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
